newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures expand gains in spurts.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures expand gains in spurts.

text.p: June 13 - U.S. stock index futures expanded gains in spurts marked by occasional pullbacks from higher record highs. Traders said volume strong, with buyers scooping up futures on dips. They said Sept S&P 500 futures outpaced cash rise, gaining more strength from rise in OTC, high-tech issues. Sept S&P 500 overshot 905.50-area equivalent to 7800 Dow 30 index.
